message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to start our negotiation. I believe this product is truly unique and valuable, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's quality and features.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $9000. I'm willing to compromise, though. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and features. I believe it's a great deal for both of us.
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to be mindful of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $9500. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $9500. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10800. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
